name: Vietnam Scenic Tour from Hanoi, Halong Bay via Hoi An to Saigon, Mekong Delta

reviews.review:
Really great professionality
I would like to give our positive comment to the DNQ travel agency for the very professional way they help and feedback to us. They are really well prepared and able to manage our requests. Unfortunately, after having planned in all the details of our trip to Cambodia and Vietnam, due to coronavirus, we decided to cancel it. Anyway, DNQ Travel did their best to give us back at least a part of the money we already paid, it was not in charge to them and we really appreciated it.
We suggest this travel agency and we will ask for them next time we will have to plan a trip to Far East. Thanks!
Kristi and friends

Booking this tour was the best decision I could have made! From the confirmation email with Mr Linh's Adventures, to the post-tour follow up, everything went smoothly and was well-organised. The itinerary was ideal to discover the whole country over three weeks, with Halong Bay (obviously!) and terraced rice fields in the North, to the charms of Central Vietnam and its beaches, and finish with the buzzling South with the Mekong Delta and its floating markets. 
We really had a great in-depth discovery, meeting with the local ethnic communities, and learning about the many different groups. 
Our guide Loi was great, he knew how to captivate us with the history of Vietnam, and always had a good joke! 
Thank you all for everything and offering us the best trip we have ever been on! We highly recommend Mr Linh's Adventures!
Excellent -everything was really well organised from airport pickups, trips, hotels, food & guides.

Full intinerary, opportunity to see so many things. Very little down time. Excellent organization of tours, pick ups, flights, etc. Very attentive to travellers needs. Would travel with legend tours again. Thank you for an excellent trip.
A diverse & vibrant tour - fantastic food - knowledgable guides - a holiday to remember

name: Mekong Delta 3 days/2 nights From Saigon

reviews.review: it is good tour but I prefer better lunch

Some things listed on the itinerary were incorrect. Said that entry to museum and train ride was included, but I had to pay for both. Also said hotel drop off was included but on the second day I was dropped off in the city and had to find my own way back to the hotel at my own expense! I’m sure the same thing would’ve happened on the third day too had it not been for me saying something to my guide. He then put me on a return trip with another group that dropped me at my hotel
